name: Ion Storm
text: Place the ion storm token in this system with either side faceup. Then, place this card in the common play area. At the end of the "Move Ships" or "Retreat" substep of a tactical action during which 1 or more of your ships use the ion storm wormhole, flip the ion storm token to its opposing side.

name: Arcane Shield Emitter
text: ATTACH: Return all infantry on this planet to the space area or destroy them. This planet cannot be bombarded. Infantry cannot be committed to, produced on, or placed on this planet.

name: Hidden Laboratory
text: Explore the frontier deck in this system.

name: Ancient Shipyard
text: Place up to 1 cruiser from your reinforcements in this system if it contains no other players' ships.

name: Orbital Foundries
text: ATTACH: This planet has a PRODUCTION value of 2 as if it were a unit.

name: Folded Space
text: Place 1 command token from your reinforcements in your fleet pool and move any number of your units in this system to the space area of another system that contains no other players' ships.

name: Suspicious Wreckage
text: Choose 2 other players, each of those players must give you 1 promissory note from their hand.

name: Dark Visions
text: Look at the top card of each exploration deck, discard any number of those cards and explore up to 1 planet you control. Then, shuffle each exploration deck.

name: Imperial Research Institute
text: ATTACH: This planet gains a non-unit technology specialty (exhaust this planet to ignore one prerequisite on any non-unit upgrade).

name: Trade Office
text: ATTACH: Whenever you exhaust this planet, gain 1 commodity.

name: Spy Agency

name: Galactic Heritage Site

name: Freighter Conversion
text: Place this card face-up in your play area, you may capture one of your carrier units from the board or your reserves. Place a captured carrier on this card. While you have a carrier on this card, your commodity value is increased by 1. At any time, you may return one of your carriers you have captured to your reserves. If this card does not have a captured carrier on it, purge this card.

name: Freighter Conversion
